targets.expr: quantile(0.67, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name)(aptos_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace"})) + 1

count(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000) OR on() vector(0)

clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000

panels.title: Connected but not Participating in Consensus

targets.expr: aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"} == 0

quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[1m]) - 2 * rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers
panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.
